segment.source: How to Edit an OSD File Using a Text Editor
segment.target: How to Edit an OSD File Using a Text Editor

segment.source: How to Edit an OSD File Using a Text Editor
segment.target: How to Edit an OSD File Using a Text Editor

segment.source: How to Edit an OSD File Using a Text Editor
segment.target: How to Edit an OSD File Using a Text Editor

segment.source: Use the following procedure to edit an Open Software Descriptor (OSD) file by using a text editor.
segment.target: Use the following procedure to edit an Open Software Descriptor (OSD) file by using a text editor.

segment.source: To edit an OSD file by using a text editor
segment.target: To edit an OSD file by using a text editor

segment.source: Open the OSD file using any XML or ASCII text editor—for example, Microsoft Notepad.
segment.target: Open the OSD file using any XML or ASCII text editor—for example, Microsoft Notepad.

segment.source: Before modifying the OSD file, read the schema prescribed by the XSD file in the install directory.
segment.target: Before modifying the OSD file, read the schema prescribed by the XSD file in the install directory.

segment.source: Failing to follow this schema might introduce errors that prevent a sequenced application from starting successfully.
segment.target: Failing to follow this schema might introduce errors that prevent a sequenced application from starting successfully.

segment.source: Edit the OSD file using your XML or ASCII text editor of choice, adhering to the prescribed schema and the following guidelines:
segment.target: Edit the OSD file using your XML or ASCII text editor of choice, adhering to the prescribed schema and the following guidelines:

segment.source: Ensure that named elements are nested within the SOFTPKG root element.
segment.target: Ensure that named elements are nested within the SOFTPKG root element.

segment.source: Ensure that element names are in all uppercase letters.
segment.target: Ensure that element names are in all uppercase letters.

segment.source: Be aware that attribute values are case sensitive.
segment.target: Be aware that attribute values are case sensitive.

segment.source: Type carefully, and observe the XML specifications.
segment.target: Type carefully, and observe the XML specifications.

segment.source: How to Edit an OSD File
